title: Mary Lewis -Student Nurse
brief_description: The story of a young girl’s three years’ training to becomes a States Registered Nurse in London. Follows the student’s life on and off duty, shows the comprehensive training received, and indicates the opportunities in various fields of nursing open to girls who qualify.
